meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Courtney Llewellyn Vincent Valenzuela Nancy Schoppa Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7827.

td.p: Courtney Llewellyn, an assistant editor from New Orleans, Louisiana
Vincent Valenzuela, an internal customer service manager from Wheaton, Illinois
Nancy Schoppa, a retired high school teacher from Saint Jo, Texas (whose 1-day cash winnings total $3,600)

tr.td: QUEEN CONSORT
LETTER PERFECT
COMPLETE THE 21st CENTURY BESTSELLER
HATS
FUN WITH TEAM NAMES
THE UNSEEN

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Catherine of Aragon had a second chance as queen consort when Prince Arthur died--she married this brother')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Catherine of Aragon had a second chance as queen consort when Prince Arthur died--she married this brother

toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', '(Vincent: What\'s the atomic bomb?)

the H-bomb

')

tr.td: Nancy
Vincent
Courtney

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Vincent] George Bernard Shaw.)
CourtneyWhat is Waiting for Godot?
$1,600
VincentWhat is Pygmalion?
$14,200
NancyWhat Pygmalion?
$15,000
Pygmalion')
div.onmouseout:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'From its preface:
"It is impossible for an Englishman to open his mouth without making some other Englishman...hate him"')

tr.td: 20th CENTURY PLAYS

From its preface:
"It is impossible for an Englishman to open his mouth without making some other Englishman...hate him"
Nancy
Vincent
Courtney
2-day champion: $35,000
2nd place: $2,000
3rd place: $1,000
Nancy
Vincent
Courtney

20 R
(including 1 DD),
5 W
(including 2 DDs)
